#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	string s;
    string temp;
    bool flag=false;
    bool flag1=false;
    while(t--)
	{
		cin >> s;
    	if(equal(s.begin(), s.begin() + s.size()/2, s.rbegin()) )cout<<"YES\n";
		else cout<<"NO\n";
		}
	return 0;
}
